title: 03/16/21 DPS Best Of
itunes:title: 03/16/21 DPS Best Of
description:
On today’s Dan Patrick Show, the football talk heats up as the first day of NFL free agency

comes and goes. ESPN’s Dianna Russini gets things started in the second hour to break down

what the Patriots tactics mean, the latest on what the Bears may do at QB, and more.

Fresh off of his new four year contract, Tampa Bay defensive end Shaq Barrett joins the show to

explain how he never was looking at any team other than Tampa. Lastly, DP keeps things

in the same division when Saints head coach Sean Payton called in to talk about Drew

Brees’ retirement, and how the Saints almost drafted Patrick Mahomes.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
